## Checklist

Before submitting, please verify:
- [ ] The tool runs entirely in the browser (no backend required)
- [ ] The source code is publicly available
- [ ] The tool is security-related
- [ ] The tool respects user privacy (no tracking/analytics)
- [ ] I have tested the tool and it works
